page.title: 20THE COTTAGE-MNKTN HEATHFIELD
page.content: The 3 pubs in the area are similar in that they all have limited housing to draw on,relying on travellers and pub games to boost their sales. The Cottage had a skittle alley built in Sept.1981.The alley is used 3 times a week.2 ladies & 2 mens teams play in the Taunton league.The players have a buffet afterwards.This is good advert- ising for the pub.Darts & cribbage are also played.Whitbread beer (Tiverton brewery) is the most popular drink for men;vodka or lager for the ladies. The Cottage does good pub lunches.Two bar staff help the landlord and his wife serve the 50 or so customers each day.25-30 of these drink in the even- ing. The pub opens from noon until 2pm and from 6 until 11pm. The landlord lives above the pub.This means he has less privacy than someone living in an ordinary house.
